Use VLC or Media player classic to play 'em. Also make sure you got the K-Lite codec pack installed. Just google it if you don't.

well... i just seen some of the episodes and realized that the quality is pretty bad for the size of each episode being around 500 - 600 MBs each for a play time of just over 20 minutes...  so i used AutoGK (google how to use it) and brought each of the files down to around 300 Mbs with no loss of quality from what i seen. but still, it's season 7 :P
